issue.title: [C++] Includes should be in alphabetical order
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14261](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14261). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Includes in

<https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/src/arrow/compute/registry_internal.h>

https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/src/arrow/compute/registry.cc

should be in alphabetical order

comments.body:
